item.title: YLS Dreams
item.dc:creator: RVMC
item.description: ✅ Enter through the grand 50 feet wide entrance gate. ✅ Move seamlessly on the 40 feet wide internal roads. […]
item.content:encoded:
✅ Enter through the grand 50 feet wide entrance gate.
✅ Move seamlessly on the 40 feet wide internal roads.
✅ Enjoy round-the-clock power supply to common areas.
✅ Experience hassle-free 24×7 water supply.
✅ Feel secure with 24×7 CCTV surveillance and security.
✅ Relax in the peaceful environment with a separate play area for kids and sit-out area for senior citizens.
✅ Stay active with the in-house Club amenities like swimming pool, basketball and badminton courts.
✅ Achieve a healthy lifestyle with the open gym, meditation area, and yoga lawn.
✅ Seek blessings at the in-house temple.
✅ Save time with convenient shopping for your daily needs.
✅ Benefit from underground cabling, sewage treatment plant and professional maintenance.

item.content:encoded:
✅ Spread over 13.70 acres of prime land.
✅ Gated complex with a common boundary wall for complete safety and peace of mind.
✅ Enter through the grand 80 feet wide entrance gate.
✅ Move seamlessly on the 30 feet wide internal roads.
✅ Feel secure with 24×7 CCTV surveillance and security.
✅ Experience hassle-free 24×7 water supply.
✅ Enjoy round-the-clock power supply to common areas.
✅ Relax in the peaceful environment with a separate play area for kids and sit-out area for senior citizens. Achieve a healthy lifestyle with the open gym, meditation area, and yoga lawn.
✅ Enjoy a pollution-free environment for a healthy living.
✅ Seek blessings at the in-house temple.
✅ Save time with convenient shopping for your daily needs.

item.content:encoded:
